main.name: MD. ABU MUSA
main.bio: My name is Musa, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working as a freelancer and also looking for opportunity to join a team.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: My specialties include quickly learning new skills and programming languages, problem solving, responsive design principles, and MVVM and MVC method of organizing code. So far I have C, C++, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap, ReactJS, NextJS,Redux, PHP, Node.JS, Express.JS , MongoDB and Git/Github under my belt.

education.degree: M.Sc. Engg. in Information and Communications Technology

education.description: Graduated with a CGPA 3.91 out of 4.00

testimonials.text: You made it so simple. My new site is so much faster and easier to work with than my old site. I just choose the page, make the change and click save.Thank You!
